1.content:
Im not your average teen, im not your average human


MARK'S POV:

"Ugh... my Head hurts, what hap... Wait, who are you, where i am at?" I said looking at my blurryish surroundings, and at the person-like shape over there

"Well, im the goddess of destiny, and you are... lets say is somewhere only we know " An voice that sounded like it came from inside of my brain said

"Ooh, this has to be an dream, i can't be dead!" i exclaimed without even thinking about it

"Who said you are? You just are badly hurt - She said while taking my hand and pointing at a window - This is what happened to you"

Then i felt like looking at a movie, the camera doing a zoom-in, through the window and going thru an perfect blue sky with green grass, very very green, until arrinving to a city that looked a lot like mine, then it zoomed in even more, to a street, in where there was a boy - me - that had a long face - i never noticed that i had such an "God Kill me" face - and was walking to his home, when all of a sudden, a truck comes and hits it, then the boy bleeds and nobody notice him, until, after about five minutes later, a nurse picks the (still bleeding) body, and explodes, leaving everything just like 6 minutes ago, the same truck crossing the street, but this time without an accident, and then the camera goes back to the green grass, but this time it goes to an hospital, it goes through first floor, then second, then third, and so on until it arrives to seventh floor, seventh gate (at least thats what it said on the door) and it gets in, focusing on the same boy (not bleeding anymore) with his soul being extracted - actually, it looked like an white heart with a face inside, but whatever - then its placed into...
1.title: Introduction

11.content: Option 1 and Option 2 have different paths, Writer's choice is Writer's choice
11.title: An Baby's body

111.content:
It was an baby's body, and then all speeded up, going thru its life, and ending in... you!.
Then it all fades out and you return to the original place.

"Look at yourself" The goddess say, with an face that showed intelligence

You did what she said and, much to your surprise, you found out that it wasn't your normal body, it was...
111.title: Option 1

1112.content:
You look at your hands and your legs, which now are so tiny that you could easily fit in a sports bag, it really confused you since not everyday you wake up as a baby

"Wait, why i am in a baby's body?, how can i talk if i am in one?, What is going to happen?, Who..." The goddess interrupted

"Do you remember that baby we say a while ago?" You nod your head "Well, since your body was way too damaged for stay alive, we decided to reconstruct your body, of course it will not be EXACTLY as your previous one, but it will be at least 98% anatomically correct..."

"Wait, what?"
You wonder who she meant by "we", you wonder what will change in your new body, you wonder what will happen to you, you wonder about a lot of things, but the only thing you can do here is to listen.

"Don't worry though, your reconstructed body is right now at your home just like if the truck had never killed you, yet you are here because in order to make your new body replace your old body without anybody noticing, we need your body to grow up just like it did originally somewhere we can transport you safely when you are fully grown" She says

"Ok....That means we are in another dimension?" You ask confused by how are you going to be transported and if time here passes just like it normally did

"Not exactly, we are just in one big room on the outskirts of heaven, waiting for you to grow up"

"And how long will it take, i mean, will it just be like normal time?"

"Yes, it will, otherwise, you'd already be back at home"

Oh crud, another 14 years to pass, what am i going to do?

"By the way, we don't normally save people just like we are doing with you now, it's just that one off your acquaintances have a life mission, and if you die just like this, that person may not fullfill it"

"Ah" Its all you get to mumble, amazed by everything that happened today

"So, do you want to meet the other people here?"

"Sure, it's not like i have a lot of things to do anyways"
1112.title: An Baby's body

choices: pull it together, but you cant talk
121.content:
A little, poor, bloody little girl laid on the bed next to you. She looks to be about no more than eight, and she is a small one. The heart meeter next to her is going in a strait line, poor girl. She has light brown hair that goes to her neck, and she has a stained, bloody yellow short skirt, and a green shirt that was too ruined to tell what it use to say. Her eyes where closed, and her face looked like, "Would you like to by some girl scout cookies?" Then you fell a sucking felling to the little girl, and you finally open your eyes, in human form.
You feel uncomfortable, not like yourself, but you don't have time to notice that as the sounds go off, the auto breather doing the breathing for you, and the heart meeter beeping at last. People rush in, pushing past the woman who had moved your soul. They swarm around you, putting more needles in your new arm, and making so much noise you almost scream. After hours of looking and sticking shots in your limbs, the doctors leave you feeling worse than you felt waking up.
The nurse walks over to you, unhooks the auto breather, and asks, "How are you sweetie?"
"Um, where am I?" you ask in a cute little girl voice. You stumble with your breath and can hardly breath. Before the doctors could rush back in, she hooks the auto breather back up to you, and you relax again.
"I'm sorry we couldn't find a boy body for you," she tells you in a pleasing voice. "I know this is very uncomfortable, but this girl needed help, and you did to, so we had to compromise." Well, since she mentioned it, you where really uncomfortable. You struggle to talk, and the nurse unhooks the breather from you and you
121.title: Young

choices: The Breather is connected again, allowing you to breathe
1211.content:
Well, the nurse unhooks the breather from you and you are about to talk, when you (naturally) inhale air, but... You Can't!
As everybody knows, when someone stops breathing, he/she suffocates, and that's exactly what happens to you.

- "Are you Alright?" The Nurse Says

- "A....i..r" you say while trying to gasp as much air as you can

Then...?
1211.title: sufficate

choices: watch another movie, only with more action
12111.content:
She quickly hooks the breather back up to you, and you begin to breath again, even though you don't breath on your own. You notice as you relax again that you have much shorter breaths.
"My, you seem to be in very terrible condition, you poor thing," she tells you. There are so many question you want to hammer he with, why was I here, why am I in this body, why do I feel so uncomfortable? But right now, you are really tiered, so you sleep.
You wake up with sores all around your body, needles in your arm, and weaker that before. You lay there for what seems like a million years, till the nurse comes in, her red hair in a pony tail. She comes over and runs some tests you've never herd of.
" Are you ready to try the breather again?" she says with such light Australian you didn't notice it until now. You are terrified that you will not be able to breath again, but you wanted to breath on your own. She unhooks the breather from you, and you are able to breath.
"Whew, I can breath," you say. You jump a bit on how little girl like your voice sounds.
"Yes, you can," the nurse says relived. You try to sit up, but you can't even tighten your stomach. You weakly pull your hands up to your hair, which is long and to your shoulder, but it is very wild and all over the place.
"Why do I look like this," you start. Then, you can't breath and you gasp for air. She hooks the breather on, and you relax again.
She goes back in the hall way, and returns with a TV. She sets up a movie, The Last One Standing, which is kind of babyish. You watch the movie, disabled, and the nurse pops in and gives you an orange tasting liquid ever now and then. Then you hear a screaming across the hall right when the movie gets good. You hear the screaming again and a "AH AH!" sound. After a little while, you hear a "Awwwww," and a baby screaming. You know you just heard a baby being born, and you want to close the door right then. You can't move your small body so you try to use the force. No luck, why couldn't be in the body of darth vader or something. Then the nurse pops in and shuts the door behind her. She gives you an IV's in your arm,and inserts some clear liquid, and then she sits next to you.
"I know you can't look at yourself, but you look really cute," she tells you. Then she gets you to open your mouth, and she gives you a slushy. You manage to put your lips around it, and you sip it. It is a blueberry slushy, and while you sip she tells you why you are like this. You then decide to
12111.title: The Breather is connected again, allowing you t...

Then you notice that you don't fell like yourself at all. You are very uncomfortable about your body, but you can't move. You are

You feel different about your chest. You would normaly put your hand to it, but you are unable to move at all. You want to puke over the way you feel about your lower area.

123.content:
A long red haired woman with a freckle here and there lay next to you, bloody and broken. The heart meeter next to her made a tiny beep now and then, like her body had lost the war but wouldn't give up. She looked to be 22, and she was very scratched up. She was a nice looking person, and some what beautiful. She seemed to have no soul. You fell a tug to her, and then you open your new eyes.
The meeter next to you started beeping like it had had a dose of antibiotics that made it work. That was the least of your worries, for all over you feel busted up, and you where very uncomfortable about body parts you didn't even know you had. The nurse that did the thing with your soul gets you ready to

15.title: Other

info.brief_description: This is the history of a teen who had an car (truck) accident and had to get a new body
info.description:
Hi, this is my first official story (the original first one got abandoned), anyways, is about a guy [Mark] who got hitted by a truck and lost almost everything from his body, so they had to put it in a new one, the context will be explained in the first chapter, whatever, here characters:

Mark [Will be explained at 1st chapter]
Age: 14
City: [For History's sake, this will be in the Future (even thought not too far away, like 10 or 12 years, so things haven't changed a lot)]
Detroit, USA (That now is like an Mixture of Spain, Italy and Argentina]
Actitude: Is Smart but not nerd, he looks a bit emo, but he doesn't cut/wear black robes, he used to be rich but now is mid-class

William: Mark's dad, he used to be poor, but he got smart enough to get a job and became mid-class (Work as Bussinessman)
Age: 33
City: Originary from PerÃº (South America)
Actitude: Parental, mixed with a bit of crazyness, is like the Mark's encyclopedia, and is one of the little group of people who think of Mark as a normal being

Roxanne: The Nurse that is staying with Mark until he wakes up, she will take an important role later in history
Age: 28
City: Originary from Australia, she is at USA because his grandfather is from there, but died, and she promissed him that will work as a nurse for at least 5 years
Actitude: Friendly, but she cant handle with angryness well

Sarah: Alternate Character, that later will take place at history, she is just a normal girl that assist to school, gets normal grades, is mid-class, etc, etc, etc
Age: 15
City: Florida, but now live at Detroit because her Aunt lives there, and her mom died
Actitude: Unfriendly unless she says otherwise (she can be friendly to some people)

*For History's sake (again) we wont talk a lot about his mom right now

RULES:

Try to don't get away from the history
At least 3 lines long (Unless you have a good reason)
I hope most people have good grammar here, because, even though is optional, it makes the story a lot easier to understand
No:
Sex /Unless it comes with true love)
Vore / Gore / Lores (if you know what i mean)


IF YOU MAKE YOUR CHAPTER GOOD ENOUGH, I MAY GIVE YOU SOME GIFT POINTS


HERE WE GO!
